title: Šikovatel Řádu
content:
Zásobovatel Řádu is one of the few merchants in Stará Wyzima from whom Geralt can buy items, if of course he is on good terms with the Řád planoucí růže at this point in the game. Brimming with self-confidence, the quartermaster is of the opinion that the Order's superior organization and logistics will lead to their certain victory, and of course they have the blessing of Věčný oheň.

If Geralt has chose the Order path, then quartermaster can be found on the eastern outskirts of Stará Wyzima, not far from Jean-Pierre a Díra ve zdi. On the Scoia'tael path, the merchant is the Zásobovatel Scoia'tael.

Jídlo
Nápoje
Výbušný prach
Brousky a runové kameny
a variety of zbraně Řádu
other Těžké zbraně
